name: Dicey Towers
description:
Defend your kingdom

Dicey Towers is a strategy tower defense game that requires you to manage your defenses so that you can defeat countless waves of enemies. Towers can be managed, upgraded, and combined to create synergies and builds that best suit any play style.

Towers

15 towers with more planned!


Enemies

11 unique enemies, including 3 difficult bosses




Please give us feedback while we continue to develop this game!
